message: Let's start fair. I take 90%, you get 10%.  We can negotiate further if you want.
My turn! How about a 60/40 split in my favor?  Consider that the value decreases for me each round.
I'm willing to go down to 70/30.  The value keeps dropping for you, so let's make a deal before it gets worse!
This is getting ridiculous. Let's just split it evenly 50/50 and be done with it. It's the fairest deal at this point.
